授業方法: Presentations and discussions. Reading homework will be assigned and students will give presentations about these in class. Students also must present their research progress. Attendance and active participation in required.

トピック.授業計画1:
After an introduction into conducting academic research, the course will be tailored to the research interests of students. Students will learn about different methodologies, for example, media studies, gender studies, narratology, fan culture.

Session 1: Introduction
Session 2-14: Presentations and discussions of methodologies and research progress

Research plan deadline: June 25.

Session 15: Discussion of progress
Session 16-28: Presentations and discussions of methodologies and research progress

Final draft deadline: December 10.

Reading assigned texts and prepare presentations for the class is necessary.
Independent work on research theme, research plan and final draft is required.
